data.title: Tenaska on LinkedIn: On April 1, 1987, Tenaska was founded by Howard Hawks, Tom Hendricks and a…
data.meta_description: On April 1, 1987, Tenaska was founded by Howard Hawks, Tom Hendricks and a few other former InterNorth executives. Tenaska quickly became a new company to…
data.text:
“Tenaska is so supportive of their employees and just the continuation of learning and growing within your career.” – Sydney Sowl #Tenaska #EnergizingTheFuture

#Tenaska has been a stable and reliable leader in the energy industry, putting our strengths to work building value for customers and communities, lenders and regulators, producers and consumers.

Celebrating American Clean Power Week with American Clean Power Association (ACP)! Today, clean energy projects can be found in all 50 states--with many more on the way. Clean energy helps power our economy. #ACPW24 #PowerTheEconomy

At #Tenaska, our employees value our reputation and know that it is to be protected at all times. #TenaskaCulture

We are excited to celebrate the remarkable milestone of #Tenaska Gateway Generating Station receiving its recertification as a Voluntary Protection Program (VPP) STAR worksite. This prestigious recognition from OSHA acknowledges outstanding workplace health and safety practices and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to safety. 🏆

Tenaska is excited to welcome our new employees to the team! · Jim Brown, Tenaska Lindsay Hill Generating Station (Billingsley, AL) · Albert Cover, Tenaska Distributed Gas Holdings (Tunkhannock, PA) · Bernardino Gaitan Jr., Tenaska Power Services, Inc. (Dallas, TX) · Joe Hall, Tenaska Marketing Ventures (Omaha, NE) · Martin Hooi, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Ali Kairys, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Adam Kurz, Tenaska Distributed Gas Holdings (Tunkhannock, PA) · Zach Lawrie, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Bryson Lucas, Tenaska Power Services, Inc. (Dallas, TX) · Justin McCall, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Tierra Meyer, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Jack Ostergaard, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Shay Richeson, Tenaska Marketing Ventures (Omaha, NE) · Lola Ross-McLennan, Tenaska Marketing Ventures (Omaha, NE) · Alex Schram, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Volker Schulz, Tenaska Marketing Ventures (Omaha, NE) · Brandon Simmons, Tenaska Power Services Co. (Dallas, TX) · Erika Tyler, Tenaska, Inc. (Omaha, NE) · Nathan West, Tenaska Power Services Co. (Dallas, TX) These talented individuals bring a wealth of experience and knowledge to Tenaska, and we look forward to working with them! #Tenaska #EnergizingTheFuture

Happy National Intern Day! 📣 Today, we recognize our talented interns. 👏 #Tenaska is grateful for their contributions and the energy they bring to our organization. #TenaskaInternships #EnergizingTheFuture #NationalInternDay

Tenaska is #hiring! 📣 We are looking for talented individuals to join our team of professionals. 💼🔥 If you are looking for a challenging and rewarding career in the energy industry, we encourage you to apply. #Tenaska #EnergizingTheFuture Check out our career opportunities and apply today!: https://lnkd.in/gMA-DcP

“The management has been spectacular. You have very intelligent, experienced individuals who you can learn from here at Tenaska.” – Wendi Brown #Tenaska #EnergizingTheFuture

#Tenaska awards scholarships to graduating high school seniors in communities surrounding Tenaska generation facilities as well as in the Omaha and Dallas areas. The scholarships are awarded to college-bound seniors with exceptional leadership skills, character, community service and school involvement. Congratulations to all the 2024 scholarship recipients! #TenaskaCares #EnergizingTheFuture
